arts.ttl: Can Atlanta United Turn Around their MLS Season After Latest Setback?
arts.sum: Atlanta United are off to their worst-ever start to an MLS season after a 3–0 loss to the Philadelphia Union on Saturday

arts.ttl: Union cruise past Atlanta United 3-0 to end three-match winless streak
arts.sum: Homegrown product Quinn Sullivan scored in the first half and Danley Jean Jacques and Tai Baribo added second-half goals as the Philadelphia Union breezed to a 3-0 victory over Atlanta United on Saturday night. Defender Kai Wagner notched his fourth assist, giving him 41 in 179 career appearances — all with the Union.
